TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationDeployment extends System.Object

summary.span: 支持以编程方式更新当前部署，以及处理文件的按需下载。

span.span: Supports updates of the current deployment programmatically, and handles on-demand downloading of files.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序配置为检查更新, 并`subscription`通过部署清单的元素自动安装更新。You can configure your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application to check for updates and install them automatically through the `subscription` element of the deployment manifest. 但是, 某些应用程序需要更好地控制其更新。Some applications, however, need finer control over their updates. 你可能想要以编程方式安装所需的更新, 并在方便时提示用户安装可选更新。You may want to install required updates programmatically, and prompt users to install optional updates at their convenience. 通过关闭部署清单中的订阅更新, 可以完全控制应用程序的更新策略。By turning off subscription updates in the deployment manifest, you can take complete control of your application's update policies. 或者, 你可以将自动订阅与结合使用, 后者允许[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]定期更新应用程序, 但会在发布重要更新后立即下载这些更新。Alternatively, you can use automatic subscription in conjunction with , which enables [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] to update the application periodically, but uses to download critical updates shortly after they are released. 您可以使用 或方法测试您的部署是否具有可用的更新; 后一种方法会在成功完成时引发事件。You can test whether your deployment has an available update by using either the or the method; the latter method raises the event on successful completion. 返回有关更新的重要信息, 例如更新的版本号以及当前用户是否需要更新。 returns important information about the update, such as its version number and whether it is a required update for current users. 如果有可用的更新, 则可以使用或安装它; 后一种方法会在更新安装完成后引发事件。If an update is available, you can install it by using or ; the latter method raises the event after installation of the update is complete. 对于较大的更新, 可以通过和事件接收进度通知, 并使用中的信息通知用户下载状态。For large updates, you can receive progress notifications through the and events, and use the information in to notify the user of the download status. 你还可以使用按需下载大型文件和程序集。You can also use to download large files and assemblies on demand. 必须在部署的应用程序清单中将这些文件标记为 "可选", 以便在安装过程中不会下载这些文件。These files must be marked as "optional" within the deployment's application manifest so that they are not downloaded during installation. 可以通过使用 或方法在应用程序持续时间内随时下载文件。You can download the files at any point during the application's duration by using the or the method. 通过为 类的事件提供事件处理程序, 可以在将程序集加载到内存中之前下载程序集。You can download assemblies before they are loaded into memory by supplying an event handler for the event on the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练：在设计器中使用 ClickOnce 部署 API 按需下载程序集](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API Using the Designer](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5). > [!NOTE] > 如果在应用程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]运行时更新应用程序, 则在调用的方法之前, 用户将看不到更新, 这会关闭当前正在运行的应用程序实例并立即重新启动以便.If you update a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application while the application is running, the user will not see the updates until you call the method of the , which will close the current running instance of the application and immediately restart it. 没有公共构造函数;您可以[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 通过属性获取应用程序中的类的实例。 has no public constructor; you obtain instances of the class within a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application through the property. 使用属性来验证当前应用程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]是否是应用程序。You use the property to verify that the current application is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application. 支持通过使用新的[基于事件的异步模式概述](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md)(公开完成回调作为类事件), 以异步方式检查更新和下载更新文件。 supports checking for updates and downloading updated files asynchronously by using the new [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md), which exposes completion callbacks as class events. 启动并管理线程, 并向正确的 UI 线程返回应用程序。 starts and manages the threads for you, and calls your application back on the correct UI thread. 通过此类, 可以在不锁定应用程序的情况下进行更新, 以便用户可以在更新安装过程中继续工作。Through this class, you can update without locking up the application, so that the user can continue working while the update installs. 如果用户必须在发生更新时停止所有工作, 请考虑改用同步方法。If the user must stop all work while an update takes place, consider using the synchronous methods instead. > [!NOTE] > 执行异步更新要求你的应用程序同时导入和命名空间。Performing asynchronous updates requires that your application import both the and namespaces. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在应用程序加载时确定是否有新的更新可用;如果有必需的更新, 则代码示例会以异步方式安装更新。The following code example determines at application load time whether a new update is available; if a required update is available, the code example installs the update asynchronously. 应将此代码添加到包含已命名`downloadStatus`的的窗体中。This code should be added to a form that contains a named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可在完全信任和部分信任的应用程序中使用。This property will work in both fully trusted and partially trusted applications. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用检索 URL 参数, 以及如何使用类来安全地分析查询字符串。The following code shows how to retrieve the URL parameters by using , and how to use the class to parse the query string safely. 在返回的的一项中合并了同一查询字符串变量的多个匹配项。Multiple occurrences of the same query string variable are consolidated in one entry of the returned . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将当前安装的部署版本与在中找到的部署清单中指定的版本进行比较。 The method compares the version of the currently installed deployment with the version specified in the deployment manifest found at . 如果服务器上的版本不同于已安装的版本, 它将返回`true`。If the version on the server is different from the installed version, it returns `true`. 此方法将被阻止, 直到完成检查。This method will block until the check has completed. 若要以异步方式检查更新, 请改用方法。To check for an update asynchronously, use the method instead. > [!NOTE] > 如果发现更新可用且用户选择不安装, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]则在下次运行应用程序时, 将提示用户提供更新。If discovers that an update is available, and the user chooses not to install it, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will prompt the user that an update is available the next time the application is run. 无法禁用此提示。There is no way to disable this prompting. (如果应用程序是必需的更新, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]则会在不提示的情况下安装它。)(If the application is a required update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will install it without prompting.) ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查应用程序更新;如果有一个可用, 则它会同步安装。The following code example checks for an application update; if one is available, it installs it synchronously. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 立即返回并启动一个单独的线程, 用于下载更新后的应用程序。 returns immediately and starts a separate thread for downloading the updated application. 当方法完成或取消时, 它会引发事件。When the method completes or is canceled, it raises the event. 您可以在此事件处理程序中使用来确定操作是否已取消, 或者是否在更新过程中引发了异常。You can use in this event handler to determine whether the operation was canceled, or if an exception was raised during update. 可以通过调用取消异步更新。You can cancel an asynchronous update by calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果发现更新可用且用户选择不安装, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]则在下次运行应用程序时, 将提示用户提供更新。If discovers that an update is available, and the user chooses not to install it, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will prompt the user that an update is available the next time the application is run. 无法禁用此提示。There is no way to disable this prompting. (如果应用程序是必需的更新, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]则会在不提示的情况下安装它。)(If the application is a required update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will install it without prompting.) ## Examples 下面的示例以异步方式检查更新, 并安装更新 (如果存在)。The following example checks for an update asynchronously, and installs the update if one exists. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消异步更新检查。

span.span: Cancels the asynchronous update check.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可取消使用方法启动的更新检查。Use this method to cancel an update check initiated with the method. 此方法不会取消任何可能正在进行的后台更新, 如作为订阅的一部分启动的更新。This method will not cancel any background update that may already be in progress, such as an update started as part of a subscription. 有关订阅的详细信息, 请参阅[选择 ClickOnce 更新策略](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8b6e7bb-4ea0-47f3-91cd-48580bdceccc)。For more information about subscriptions, see [Choosing a ClickOnce Update Strategy](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8b6e7bb-4ea0-47f3-91cd-48580bdceccc).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将告诉你, 更新的版本、更新的大小以及可用更新是必需的还是可选的。The class will tell you, among other things, the version of the update, how large the update is, and whether the available update is required or optional. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来确定是否要求用户安装可用的应用程序更新。The following code example uses to decide whether to ask the user to install the available application update. 如果更新是必需升级, 则事件处理程序不会提示用户。If the update is a mandatory upgrade, the event handler does not prompt the user. 该示例要求你部署一个包含控件的 Windows 窗体应用程序, 并且此控件包含一个名为`downloadStatus`的控件。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 报告应用程序的部署清单的下载状态。 reports on the download status of the application's deployment manifest. 对于在慢速网络连接上下载部署的用户而言, 这可能是一项重要的信息。This can be important information for users who are downloading the deployment over slow network connections. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件来通知用户要下载多少部署清单。The following code example uses the event to inform the user how much of the deployment manifest is left to download. 该示例要求你部署一个包含控件的 Windows 窗体应用程序, 并且此控件包含一个名为`downloadStatus`的控件。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你不能直接在应用程序中创建的实例; 你必须通过属性检索有效的实例。You cannot create instances of directly in your application; you must retrieve a valid instance through the property. 静态属性只能从使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]部署的应用程序内部有效。 The static property is valid only from within an application that was deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. 尝试从非[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序调用此属性将引发异常。Attempts to call this property from non-[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications will throw an exception. 如果你正在开发的应用程序可能使用或不使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]进行部署, 请使用属性来测试当前程序是否是[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序。If you are developing an application that may or may not be deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use the property to test whether the current program is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索并检查以确定是否已在过去三天内更新应用程序。The following code example retrieves and checks to determine whether the application has been updated in the past three days. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]在应用程序中, 应用程序清单中标记为 "可选" 的文件在初始化或更新过程中不会下载。In a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, the files marked "optional" in the application manifest are not downloaded during initialization or update. 你可以使用方法来按需下载属于命名组的所有文件, 以便在你确定用户需要它们之前, 不会消耗网络资源和磁盘空间。You can use the method to download all of the files belonging to a named group on demand, so that they do not consume network resources and disk space until you are sure the user requires them. 例如, 某些用户可能需要每天使用您的应用程序中包含的数据分析包, 而其他用户则可能永远不会调用它。For example, certain users may need to use a data analysis package included in your application on a daily basis, while other users may never invoke it. 若要使用已下载的程序集, 请将事件侦听器附加到上 的事件。To use an assembly you have downloaded with , you attach an event listener to the event on the . 有关示例, 请参阅 =[演练:在设计器中使用 ClickOnce 部署 API 按需下载程序集](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5)。For an example, see =[Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API Using the Designer](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5). 所有文件都下载到[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序缓存中, 因此与当前版本的应用程序隔离。All files are downloaded to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application cache and are therefore isolated to the current version of the application. 假设应用程序下载文件组后, 用户会安装新版本的应用程序, 但稍后会恢复到应用程序的以前版本。Let's say that after an application downloads a file group, the user installs a new version of the application, but later reverts to the previous version of the application. 在这种情况下, 先前版本仍将具有它最初下载的文件的副本。In this case, the previous version will still have the copies of the files it originally downloaded. 有关访问数据文件的详细信息, 请参阅[在 ClickOnce 应用程序中访问本地数据和远程数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information about accessing data files, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d). 在部分受信任的应用程序中工作, 即[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] , 在运行具有受限权限的应用程序中。 works in partially trusted applications, that is, in any [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application running with restricted permission. 但是, 如果您尝试动态加载程序集, 则您的应用程序将需要完全信任。However, if you attempt to load assemblies dynamically, your application will require full trust. 当前不支持按需下载数据文件。On-demand downloading of data files is currently not supported. 在方法返回之前, 应用程序将不会响应用户输入。Your application will not be responsive to user input until the method returns. 如果需要在不中断用户工作流的情况下下载文件, 请改用方法。If you need to download files without interrupting the user's workflow, use the method instead. 不能单独按文件名下载单个文件。You cannot download a single file by its file name alone. 若要下载单个文件, 请在[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]部署中为其分配一个组名称, 并使用此方法下载组。To download a single file, assign it a group name in your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment and download the group using this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过侦听事件, 按需加载程序集。The following code example demonstrates how to load an assembly on demand by listening for the event. [!code-csharp[ClickOnceOnDemandCmdLine#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceOnDemandCmdLine/CS/Form1.cs#2)]

summary.span: 完成一个文件下载时在主应用程序线程中发生。

span.span: Occurs on the main application thread when a file download is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在主应用程序线程上调用事件。The event is called on the main application thread. 在此回调中直接调用应用程序的 Windows 窗体控件是线程安全的。It is thread safe to call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback. 检查提供给此回调的的属性。Check the property of the supplied to this callback. 如果此属性为`null`, 则下载成功; 如果不`null`是, 则安装未成功, 你可以通过属性找到有关安装失败的详细信息。If this property is `null`, the download was successful; if it is not `null`, the installation did not succeed, and you can find more information about the installation failure through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在后台下载一组帮助文件。The following code example downloads a group of Help files in the background. 该示例要求你部署一个包含控件的 Windows 窗体应用程序, 并且此控件包含一个名为`downloadStatus`的控件。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在部分信任的应用程序中工作, 无需任何安全要求。 works in a partially trusted application without any security demands. 更新应用程序时, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]会将任何按需数据文件从以前的版本复制到新版本的数据目录中。When you update an application, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] copies any on-demand data files from the previous version into the new version's data directory. 如果下载这些文件的新版本, 应从旧版本中删除任何要保留的数据, 并将其移到新版本中。If you download a new version of these files, you should remove any data you want to keep from the old version and move it into the new version. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将`HelpFiles`组中的所有文件下载到磁盘。The following code example downloads all of the files in the `HelpFiles` group to disk. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用确定是否需要在首次运行应用程序时执行任何一次性的初始化操作。Use to determine whether you need to perform any one-time initialization operations the first time your application runs. 不要假设 `true`设置为指示应用程序的这一实例是向用户显示其用户界面的第一个实例。Do not assume that a setting of `true` indicates that this instance of an application is the first one to show its user interface to the user. 由于系统计划进程的方式, 应用程序的一个实例可能会将其属性设置为`true`, 而另一个实例可能是第一个在屏幕上呈现的实例。Due to the way the system schedules processes, one instance of the application may have its property set to `true`, but another instance may be the first to render on the screen. 每当用户从一个版本升级到下一个版本时, 此属性的值就会重置。The value of this property is reset whenever the user upgrades from one version to the next. 如果只想在运行应用程序的任何版本时执行操作, 则需要执行其他测试, 如检查是否存在首次创建的文件, 或使用**应用程序设置**存储标志。If you want to perform an operation only the very first time any version of the application is run, you will need to perform an additional test, such as checking for the existence of a file you created the first time, or storing a flag using **Application Settings**. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来确定是否检查文件组`HelpFiles`的更新。The following code example uses to decide whether to check for an update to the file group `HelpFiles`. 如果一个或多个文件已更新, 则它将调用以获取新版本。If one or more of the files have been updated, it calls to obtain the new versions. [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序可以配置订阅更新。A [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application can be configured for subscription updates. 在此方案中[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] , 将按部署清单中定义的时间间隔自动轮询应用程序的部署位置, 并确定是否有可用的更新。In this scenario, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] polls an application's deployment location automatically at intervals defined in the deployment manifest, and determines whether there is an update available. 返回上次更新检查的时间, 不管是由订阅启动还是通过使用、 、 、 或方法的显式检查来启动。 returns the time of the last update check regardless of whether it was initiated by a subscription or by an explicit check using the , , , , or method. 如果自安装应用程序后未执行任何更新检查, 则返回安装时间。If no update check has been performed since the application was installed, returns the installation time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查过去三[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]天是否已检查应用程序的可用更新。The following code example checks whether a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has been checked for available updates in the past three days. returns.span: 如果应用程序已更新，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an application has been updated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将新版本的应用程序发布到指定的位置, 并且应用程序的部署清单中的版本号大于当前应用程序的版本号时, 应用程序将被视为已更新安装在用户的计算机上。An application is considered updated when you publish a new version of the application to the location specified by , and the version number in the application's deployment manifest is greater than the version number of the application currently installed on the user's computer. 此调用将被阻止, 直到更新已下载到客户端计算机并安装[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]到缓存中; 在此期间, 该应用程序将不会响应用户。 The call will block until the update has been downloaded to the client computer and installed into the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] cache; during this time, the application will not be responsive to the user. 如果要在下载过程中保持应用程序响应或显示进度报告, 请改用方法。If you want to maintain application responsiveness or display a progress report during download, use the method instead. 下载应用程序清单中未标记为 "可选" 的所有文件。 downloads all of the files that are not marked as "optional" in the application manifest. 您可以通过使用 或方法, 按需下载可选文件。You can download optional files on demand by using the or the method. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]在调用方法时可能已自动更新应用程序; 如果发生这种情况, 则调用此方法将引发。may already be updating the application automatically when you call the method; if that happens, calls to this method will throw an . 如果已在部署中更新了一个或多个文件, 但尚未刷新应用程序清单, 则会收到。If you have updated one or more files in your deployment, but you have not refreshed your application manifest, you will receive an . 大多数情况下, 重新部署[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序就能解决此问题。Most of the time, redeploying your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application solves this problem. 如果部署清单或应用程序清单上的公钥签名无效或缺失, 您也会收到此异常。You will also receive this exception if a public-key signature on a deployment manifest or application manifest is invalid or missing. 更新可能会在本地计算机上请求比应用程序的以前版本更高的信任级别。An update may request a higher level of trust on the local computer than the previous version of the application. 如果应用程序使用受信任的应用程序部署, 则公共语言运行时 (CLR) 信任关系管理器将检查部署清单, 以确定它是否包含有效的信任许可证。If the application uses Trusted Application Deployment, the common language runtime (CLR) trust manager examines the deployment manifest to determine whether it contains a valid trust license. 如果部署清单不包含有效的信任许可证, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]则将停止安装并引发。If the deployment manifest does not contain a valid trust license, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stops the installation and throws a . 该方法将不会显示询问用户是否要授予应用程序运行权限的提示。The method will never display a prompt asking the user whether they want to grant the application permission to run. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查应用程序更新;如果更新可用, 则它会同步安装。The following code example checks for an application update; if an update is available, it installs it synchronously. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UpdateAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 开始异步下载和安装此应用程序的最新版本。

span.span: Starts an asynchronous download and installation of the latest version of this application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将新版本的应用程序发布到指定的位置, 并且应用程序的部署清单中的版本号大于当前应用程序的版本号时, 应用程序将被视为已更新安装在用户的计算机上。An application is considered updated when you publish a new version of the application to the location specified by , and the version number in the application's deployment manifest is greater than the version number of the application currently installed on the user's computer. 在下载更新时, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]将在主应用程序线程上引发事件处理程序, 通知您下载的状态。While downloading the update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will raise the event handler on the main application thread to inform you of the status of the download. 在异步更新完成或遇到异常时, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]将在主应用程序线程上引发事件。When the asynchronous update finishes or encounters an exception, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will raise the event on the main application thread. 检查提供给此事件的, 以确定更新是否成功。Examine the supplied to this event to determine whether the update succeeded. 如果引发异常, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]则调用并将的 属性设置为引发的异常。If throws an exception, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] calls and sets the property of to the exception that was thrown. 将下载部署中的所有文件, 这些文件在应用程序清单中未标记为 "可选"。 will download all files in a deployment not marked as "optional" in the application manifest. 您可以通过使用 或方法, 按需下载可选文件。You can download optional files on demand by using the or the method. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]在调用方法时可能已自动更新应用程序; 如果发生这种情况, 则调用此方法将引发。may already be updating the application automatically when you call the method; if that happens, calls to this method will throw an . 如果已在部署中更新了一个或多个文件, 但尚未刷新应用程序清单, 则会收到。If you have updated one or more files in your deployment, but you have not refreshed your application manifest, you will receive an . 大多数情况下, 重新生成应用程序清单会解决此问题。Most of the time, rebuilding your application manifest solves this problem. 如果部署清单或应用程序清单上的公钥签名无效或缺失, 您也会收到此异常。You will also receive this exception if a public-key signature on a deployment manifest or application manifest is invalid or missing. 更新可能会在本地计算机上请求比应用程序的以前版本更高的信任级别。An update may request a higher level of trust on the local computer than the previous version of the application. 如果应用程序使用受信任的应用程序部署, 则公共语言运行时 (CLR) 信任关系管理器将检查部署清单, 以确定它是否包含有效的信任许可证。If the application uses Trusted Application Deployment, the common language runtime (CLR) trust manager examines the deployment manifest to determine whether it contains a valid trust license. 如果部署清单不包含有效的信任许可证, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]则将停止安装并引发。If the deployment manifest does not contain a valid trust license, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stops the installation and throws a . 将不会显示询问用户是否要授予应用程序运行权限的提示。 will never display a prompt asking the user if they want to grant the application permission to run. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定新的更新在应用程序加载时是否可用;如果有必需的更新, 则它会以异步方式安装更新。The following code example determines whether a new update is available at application load time; if a required update is available, it installs the update asynchronously. 该示例要求你部署一个包含控件的 Windows 窗体应用程序, 并且此控件包含一个名为`downloadStatus`的控件。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Occurs when [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] has finished upgrading the application as the result of a call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在主应用程序线程上调用事件。The event is called on the main application thread. 你可以直接在此回调内调用应用程序的 Windows 窗体控件, 而不会触发异常。You may call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback without triggering an exception. 检查提供给此回调的的属性。Check the property of the supplied to this callback. 如果此属性为`null`, 则安装成功; 如果不`null`是, 则安装未成功, 你可以通过属性找到有关此安装失败的详细信息。If this property is `null`, the installation was successful; if it is not `null`, the installation did not succeed, and you can find more information about this installation failure through the property. 下载更新后, 你将需要对调用方法以使用应用程序的较新版本。Once the update has been downloaded, you will need to call the method on the to use the newer version of the application. 如果通过调用取消了更新的安装, 则类的属性将为`true`。If the installation of the update was canceled by a call to , the property of the class will be `true`. 若要使用此事件处理程序, 你的应用程序必须同时导入和命名空间。To use this event handler, your application must import both the and namespaces. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在应用程序加载时确定是否有新的更新可用;如果有必需的更新, 则它会以异步方式安装更新。The following code example determines at application load time whether a new update is available; if a required update is available, it installs the update asynchronously. 该示例要求你部署一个包含控件的 Windows 窗体应用程序, 并且此控件包含一个名为`downloadStatus`的控件。The example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application that includes a control, and that this control contain a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已安装新的更新, 但尚未在上调用 , 则与不同。 differs from if a new update has been installed but you have not yet called on the . 如果将应用程序的部署清单配置为执行自动更新, 可以比较这两个值, 以确定是否应重新启动应用程序。If the application's deployment manifest is configured to perform automatic updates, you can compare these two values to determine whether you should restart the application. 如果应用程序尚未更新, 则返回与相同的值。If the application has not been updated, returns the same value as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了一个方法, 该[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]方法确定是否已更新了应用程序。The following code example defines a method that determines whether [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] has updated the application. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在主应用程序线程上调用事件。The event is called on the main application thread. 你可以直接在此回调内调用应用程序的 Windows 窗体控件, 而不会触发异常。You may call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback without triggering an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在应用程序加载时确定是否有新的更新可用;如果有必需的更新, 则它会以异步方式安装更新。The following code example determines at application load time whether a new update is available; if a required update is available, it installs the update asynchronously.
